channel.title: [DELTA] Yell Command
channel.description:
Hey, can someone send me a snippet of a yell command? as the one i have doesnt work...
thanks.

item.title: [DELTA] Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String titles[] = { "Player", "Moderator", "Administrator" } yell(titles[playerRights]+" "+playerName+" "+command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

google it the next time.

 if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";

 if (donator == 1) {
 titles = "[Donator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
} 
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Set what you want here, some servers this is hidden, others co owner.] ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Eric")) {
titles = "[*ServerName* Owner]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic
